sentences.en: According to Nathan, Robin has quite a temper .
sentences.cn: 据内森讲，罗宾脾气很大。

sentences.en: He curbed his temper.
sentences.cn: 他稳住了情绪。

sentences.en: He had a terrible temper, and sometimes he would completely lose control.
sentences.cn: 他的脾气很坏，有时会完全失控。

sentences.en: He was about to lose his temper but checked himself in time.
sentences.cn: 他刚要发火，不过又及时克制住了。

sentences.en: He was in a very good temper.
sentences.cn: 他当时心情非常好。

sentences.en: He's got that fiery temper which scares the whatsit out of everybody.
sentences.cn: 他有一副能把所有人都吓得那个什么滚什么流的火爆脾气。

sentences.en: I have a very short fuse and a violent temper.
sentences.cn: 我容易发怒，脾气暴躁。

sentences.en: I just couldn't control my temper.
sentences.cn: 我就是不能克制自己的脾气。

sentences.en: I lost my temper and banged my book down on the desk.
sentences.cn: 我大发雷霆，把书砰地往课桌上一摔。

sentences.en: I've never seen him get cross or lose his temper.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过他生气或者发火。

sentences.en: I’ve never seen Vic lose his temper.
sentences.cn: 我从未看到过维克发脾气。

sentences.en: Mal's temper was at boiling point.
sentences.cn: 马尔正在气头上，一点就着。

sentences.en: Mick was stubborn and domineering with a very bad temper.
sentences.cn: 米克既固执又专横，脾气还很坏。

sentences.en: Never before had he felt the full lash of John's temper.
sentences.cn: 他以前从未见识过约翰如此暴烈的脾气.

sentences.en: Pete hit his brother in a fit of temper .
sentences.cn: 皮特一气之下打了他弟弟。

sentences.en: She had a fiery temper and liked to get her own way.
sentences.cn: 她脾气火爆，喜欢我行我素。

sentences.en: tempered steel
sentences.cn: 回火钢

sentences.en: That temper of hers will get her into trouble one of these days.
sentences.cn: 她那种脾气早晚会让她惹麻烦的。

sentences.en: The heat in this coastal town is tempered by cool sea breezes.
sentences.cn: 清凉的海风消减了这座海滨小城的暑气。

sentences.en: The only flaw in his character seems to be a short temper.
sentences.cn: 他性格中的唯一缺点好像就是脾气急。

sentences.en: Theo needs to learn to control his temper .
sentences.cn: 西奥应该学会控制他的脾气。

sentences.en: Though he had a temper and could be nasty, it never lasted.
sentences.cn: 虽然他爱发脾气，而且有时还很讨厌，但向来都只是一阵儿。

words.tran_cn: 喜怒无常的；性情的；易兴奋的
缓和的，温和的；调节的；有…气质的
戒酒；节欲；（气候等的）温和

phrases.tran_cn: 脾气坏，性子不好；心情不好
捺住（捺不住）性子，不使脾气发作（发脾气，生气）

trans.tran_cn: 性情，脾气，特征，（钢等）回火，怒气
trans.tran_en: the way you are feeling at a particular time, especially when you are feeling angry for a short time
to make something less severe or extreme
to make something less severe or extreme
